NAME: Nilesh Agarwal
ABOUT: Looking out for hard technical problems that have game changing impact on bussiness

PROJECTS TAKEN.Description: It is a dual platform system that allows attendance to be recorded on Android tablet and all the data gets stored on a synchronized Web Server. The front-end of the system was made using Java, JavaScript, AJAX, PHP and the back-end was made using MySQL, SQLite.

University Attendance System – A web based App that allows University Admin to add Batches, teachers and assign teacher to batches i.e. setup the account of teacher. An Android application that allows teachers to use their smart phone to mark Attendance and set schedule for classes. System features automatic reminders to students having low attendance, helps in maintaining central database and reduces the wastage of paper

PROJECTS TAKEN.Title of Project: Software Defect Predition Using Machine Learning
PROJECTS TAKEN.Description:
Designed a tool that helps prediction of severity of a defect using the text description of the test and IDF that given any sample bug list for training effectively predicts the severity of new defects. 
- Using NLP library for mining the data
- Analysis of performance of various Algorithms
